title: The Night Before the Live - 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Did you all hear about Kanata-senpai? Kanata-senpai was so excited that she couldn’t fall asleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s very surprising to hear.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What kind of magic did Emma and Shizuku perform?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s a type of magic called “keeping your head cool while keeping your legs warm.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hm~ I see.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>How does that work?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>None of you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What!? Of course, Kasumin knows! Kasumin just happened to forget...... Umm... Basically......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s on the tip of my tongue too......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Really......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yawn~ Kasumin is getting tired......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Me too. I’ll search it up tomorrow, Mia. We should sleep now so that we have energy for our live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m intrigued, so I’m not really tired......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I guess it can’t be helped. Do you want a backrub?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You don’t have to do that. I can sleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
